content.text:
# Draft:Vishesh Gangwar

Vishesh Gangwar is an Indian student recognized for his achievements in academics and extracurricular activities at Kendriya Vidyalaya Air Force Station Bareilly.
He has been featured by the Kendriya Vidyalaya Sangathan under its *Student Achievers* category.
Early life and education
Vishesh was born and raised in Bareilly, Uttar Pradesh.
He studies at Kendriya Vidyalaya Air Force Station Bareilly, where he has been involved in academics, technology, and creative projects.
Recognition
In 2025, Vishesh was listed as a *Student Achiever* on the [https://afsbareilly.kvs.ac.in/en/student-achiever/ official website of Kendriya Vidyalaya AFS Bareilly].
This recognition was given for his performance in academic and co-curricular excellence.

* Bareilly
